title: World's most powerful passports revealed [Photos]
text:
Friday, July 03, 2015 06:00 AM MDT World's most powerful passports revealed Previous Next 
The world's most powerful passports have been revealed in a new survey from GoEuro . The Berlin-based travel site ranked the passports of 50 countries based on visa free access, cost of the passport and length of validity. The Canadian passport was ranked number seven in the survey, with Sweden coming in first. Find the world's top 10 most powerful passports, based on GoEuro's rankings, in our photo gallery. (Fotolia) 
1. Sweden. Visa-free countries: 174. Cost in Canadian dollars: $53. 
2. Finland. Visa-free countries: 174. Cost in Canadian dollars: $56. 
3. Germany. Visa-free countries: 174. Cost in Canadian dollars: $85. 
4. United Kingdom. Visa-free countries: 174. Cost in Canadian dollars: $135. 
5. United States of America. Visa-free countries: 174. Cost in Canadian dollars: $165. 
6. Denmark. Visa-free countries: 173. Cost in Canadian dollars: $116. 
7. Canada. Visa-free countries: 173. Cost in Canadian dollars: $160. 
8. Spain. Visa-free countries: 172. Cost in Canadian dollars: $37. 
9. Belgium. Visa-free countries: 172. Cost in Canadian dollars: $93. 
10. Netherlands. Visa-free countries: 172. Cost in Canadian dollars: $96.
